law.catch_line: Applicant to pay for own license.
law.text: The license fee for every license under KRS 243.020 to 243.670 shall be payable by the person who makes application for the license and to whom it is issued, and no other person shall pay for any license issued under those sections.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2554b-163.
